瞻前顧後.definition: lit. to look forward and back (idiom); fig. to consider carefully; to weigh the pros and cons; fig. to be overcautious and indecisive

瞻拜.definition: to worship; to gaze with reverence

瞻望.definition: to look far ahead; to look forward (to)

瞻顧.definition: to look forward and back cautiously
